sentences.en: A policeman would not live one year if he obeyed these regulations.
sentences.cn: 警察如果遵守这些规定的话，一年都活不了。

sentences.en: A rather odd family came tolive next door to us.
sentences.cn: 有一户相当奇怪的人家搬到了我们隔壁。

sentences.en: Adults need to live their own lives and that's difficult with children.
sentences.cn: 大人需要过他们自己的生活，但有了孩子就很难做到了。

sentences.en: As soon as I saw the place, I knew I didn’t want to live there.
sentences.cn: 我一看到那地方，就觉得不想住在那儿。

sentences.en: disliked the situation but had to live with it.
sentences.cn: 不喜欢这种状态但必须忍受它

sentences.en: Does Paul stilllive here?
sentences.cn: 保罗还住在这儿吗？

sentences.en: experiments on live animals
sentences.cn: 动物活体实验

sentences.en: For what do we live, but to make sport for our neighbours, and laugh at them in our turn?
sentences.cn: 我们活着是为了什么？不就是给邻居当笑柄，再反过来笑他们。

sentences.en: good God, Jack Stone, as I live and breathe!.
sentences.cn: 老天，杰克•斯通，真没想到！。

sentences.en: He lived in the eighteenth century.
sentences.cn: 他生活在18世纪。

sentences.en: He lives just across the street from me.
sentences.cn: 他就住在我街对面。

sentences.en: household servants who live in.
sentences.cn: 家仆住在主人家中

sentences.en: household servants who live out.
sentences.cn: 不住在主人家的仆人们

sentences.en: I came to live at the farm by happenstance.
sentences.cn: 我来到该农场住下纯属偶然。

sentences.en: I clearly empathize with the people who live in those neighborhoods.
sentences.cn: 我非常同情生活在那些地方的人们。

sentences.en: I will return, find you, love you, marry you and live without shame.
sentences.cn: 我会回去，找到你，爱你，娶你，活的光明正大。《赎罪》

sentences.en: I’m quite happy living alone.
sentences.cn: 我一个人住很开心。

sentences.en: It has touched me deeply to see how these people live.
sentences.cn: 看到这些人的生活境况，我深受触动。

sentences.en: live animals
sentences.cn: 活动物

sentences.en: Most seventeen-year-olds still live at home(= live with their parents ).
sentences.cn: 17 岁的孩子大都还住在家里。

sentences.en: Now we live further away from the city centre.
sentences.cn: 现在我们住得离市中心更远了。

sentences.en: People live longer nowadays, and they are better educated.
sentences.cn: 当今，人们越来越长寿，受教育程度也提高了。

sentences.en: Protesters want to stop the export of live sheep and cattle.
sentences.cn: 抗议者希望阻止出口活羊活牛。

sentences.en: Residents in general are poor and undereducated, and live in sub-standard housing.
sentences.cn: 居民们普遍都很贫穷，受教育程度低，居住条件较差。

sentences.en: She'smuch happier performing live than in a recording studio.
sentences.cn: 与在录音棚里录音相比，她更喜欢现场表演。

sentences.en: Some of them live in places quite a long way from here.
sentences.cn: 他们中有些人住的地方离这里很远。

sentences.en: That programme will include live commentary on the England-Ireland game.
sentences.cn: 那个节目将包括英格兰与爱尔兰比赛的实况报道。

sentences.en: The doctors said he only had six months to live.
sentences.cn: 医生说他只能活六个月了。

sentences.en: The house has 3,600 square feet of living space(= the areas of a house you live in ).
sentences.cn: 这房子有3,600平方英尺的居住空间。

sentences.en: the number of live births per 1,000 population
sentences.cn: 每1,000人中的活产婴儿数目

sentences.en: they live and breathe Italy and all things Italian.
sentences.cn: 他们热衷于意大利和与意大利有关的所有东西。

sentences.en: They’ve finally found a place to live.
sentences.cn: 他们终于找到了住的地方。

sentences.en: Try to get a feeling for the people who live here.
sentences.cn: 试着去理解在这片土地上生息的人们。

sentences.en: We don't live in the lap of luxury, but we're comfortable.
sentences.cn: 我们的生活虽然并非锦衣玉食，也算是衣食无忧。

sentences.en: We live only a few miles from the coast.
sentences.cn: 我们住的地方离海边只有几英里远。

sentences.en: We were so excited to seereal liveelephants.
sentences.cn: 看到活生生的大象我们非常兴奋。

sentences.en: We’re still looking for somewhere to live.
sentences.cn: 我们还在找住的地方。

sentences.en: Without light, plants couldn’t live.
sentences.cn: 没有阳光，植物就无法生存。

words.tran_cn: 适于居住的；生活过得有价值的
活泼的；生动的；真实的；生气勃勃的
活的；现存的；活跃的；逼真的
活的；生动的；实况转播的；精力充沛的

phrases.tran_cn: ［多用于英语口语中，表达见到某人某事的惊喜］真没想到
独自生活；一个人住；单独居住
学无止境；活到老学到老；活得长，见识多；学到新事物
(谚)给别人留点儿面子（或： 自己活也让别人活；相互宽容）
洗心革面：在一段时间后克服或减轻了（如罪行）带来的耻辱
活在过去里，思想守旧，老古董
vt. 隶属于；在…统治下生活
不会感到内疚，会心安理得的；自重

trans.tran_cn: 活的， 现场直播的，通电的，仍可爆炸的

trans.tran_en: if you live in a place, you have your home there

trans.tran_cn: 居住，生存，活着，生活，以…为生，留存，铭记，恪守（信念等）
trans.tran_en: if you live in a place, you have your home there
if you live in a place, you have your home there
to continue to live or work after a failure or after you have dealt with a difficult situation
